Extravasation Treatment. 3 day protocol. First dose should be initiated as soon as possible (within the first 6 hours after extravasation) with subsequent doses 24 hours apart. MAXIMUM dose (DAY 1 & 2): 2000 mg/day. Recommend reducing dose 50% in patients with CrCl less than 40 mL/minute.
